title: Pyrelord

properties.name: description
properties.value: Pyrelords are stronger variants of pyrefiends that require level 30 Slayer to kill. They are found within the Sisterhood Sanctuary and on the north side of the Isle of Souls.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Pyrelord
This article is about the stronger variant. For the standard variant, see Pyrefiend. For the superior variant, see Infernal pyrelord.
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Pyrelords are stronger variants of pyrefiends that require level 30 Slayer to kill. They are found within the Sisterhood Sanctuary and on the north side of the Isle of Souls.

  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Weapons and armour

    • 2.5 Other

    • 2.7 Tertiary
  • 3 Changes

Isle of Souls603Maplink

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Pyrelord kill is worth 574.19.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update | poll)

Pyrelords now drop fiendish ashes in place of regular ashes.

17 March 2021
(update)

Several monsters, including Pyrelords, were tagged as demonic, allowing demonbane weapons to work on them.

13 February 2020
(update)

The drop table, previously identical to a pyrefiend's, has been slightly improved. A superior variant, the infernal pyrelord, was added to accommodate this change.
